availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Frank Christopher Catron (Knox County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff)

body.p: Knox County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff. Virginia native. Married to Nancy M. Duff Catron. Father of William Catron, Mary Catron, Corena Catron, Thomas Catron, and Lucy Catron. Farmer in Washington County, Virginia, in 1860. Sheriff of Knox County in 1861. Farmer in Knox County in 1863.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Virginia, Washington County, Western District, p. 210; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Virginia, Washington County, Abingdon, p. 6; Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Knox County, Kentucky, July 1863, p. 38, (Accessed via ancestry.com); Find A Grave, "Francis Christopher Catron (1824-1906)," Memorial #73249893, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=73249893 (accessed August 22, 2017).
